module.name: colissimo_simplicite
module.description: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe. 48h delivery service to home addresses or collection points.
module.additional_description: A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service in EuropeAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.name: hipay_professional
module.description: Mit dem HiPay-Modul können Sie Ihre Transaktionen online ohne Fernabsatzvertrag und mit integriertem Missbrauchsschutz tätigen
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mit dem HiPay-Modul können Sie Ihre Transaktionen online ohne Fernabsatzvertrag und mit integriertem Missbrauchsschutz tätigen. Das Modul ermöglicht Ihnen, auf alle internationalen und lokalen Zahlungslösungen zuzugreifen (z.B. Visa, Mastercard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: skrill
module.description: Mit Millionen von treuen Kunden weltweit deckt Skrill den Bedarf von über 156
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mit Millionen von treuen Kunden weltweit deckt Skrill den Bedarf von über 156.000 Unternehmen rund um den Globus und bietet ihnen damit eine Möglichkeit, Geld auf bequeme und sichere Art in fast 200 Ländern und 40 Währungen zu senden und zu empfangen.
module.additional_description: Schnelle und kostenlose EinrichtungZugang zu mehr als 100 lokalen Zahlungslösungen mit 1 einfachen IntegrationVerbindung zu über 30 Millionen Skrill-KontoinhabernHöchste Sicherheitsstandards und BetrugsschutztechnikNahtloses Zahlungserlebnis auf Handy, Tablet und Computer

module.name: paypal
module.description: Profitieren Sie von den PayPal-Zahlungslösungen und kurbeln Sie Ihr Geschäft an – online, mobil und international
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Profitieren Sie von den PayPal-Zahlungslösungen und kurbeln Sie Ihr Geschäft an – online, mobil und international.
module.additional_description: Neue Funktionen in Version 4.2 Neues Braintree-Produkt für Frankreich, Großbritannien, Spanien und Italien, Braintree Auth-Onboarding 3DS-Schwellenwert-Auslöser Unterstützung für mehrere Währungen Kreditkarte wird nur nach Deaktivieren von PayPal akzeptiert PayPal neu: Option der Verknüpfung für PayPal Express-Kaufabwicklung hinzugefügt Verbesserungen: API-Benutzernamen anzeigen Aktualisierte Marketing-Inhalte Aktualisierte Übersetzungen für FR, EN, DE, IT, ES, PT, PL Weltweite Behebung kleinerer Fehler

module.name: mondialrelay
module.description: Dieses Modul von Mondial Relay angeboten wird, ist es bereits in Version 1.4 von PrestaShop integriert. Sie können ihn kostenlos für Version 1.3
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Dieses Modul von Mondial Relay angeboten wird, ist es bereits in Version 1.4 von PrestaShop integriert. Sie können ihn kostenlos für Version 1.3 .
module.additional_description: Mit über 40 Millionen Pakete durch ein Netzwerk von 4 900 Pick-up Points (Frankreich, Belgien und Luxemburg) und Zustelldienste geliefert wird, Mondial Relay ein wichtiger Akteur für die Lieferung an Privatpersonen .

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.displayName: Boxtal Shipping - pick up, door to door, express
module.description: Manage multiple carriers using one single module and save up to 75% on your shipping costs without commitments or any contracts
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage multiple carriers using one single module and save up to 75% on your shipping costs without commitments or any contracts.
module.additional_description: 1. IMPROVE YOUR CONVERSION RATESGive a choice between different shipping options which suit best your clients : pick up stations (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, etc.), standard (Colissimo, Happy-Post, etc.), express (Chronopost, FedEx, DHL Express, UPS, TNT Express, etc.). 2. REDUCE YOUR SHIPPING COSTSSave up to 75% on your shipping costs with the best shipping services without commitments or any contracts. 3. SAVE TIME ON MANAGING YOUR SHIPMENTSPrint shipping labels directly from your PrestaShop back-office. Track, cancel or reschedule your orders in one place. One single invoice for all shipping services. 4. ACCELERATE YOUR WEBSITE LAUNCH One single plugin to manage all your shipments. Boxtal is your only contact before, during and after delivery, whatever carriers were selected. Save time and focus on the essential of your business.

module.name: ogone
module.description: Ingenico ePayments*: Höhere umsätze durch online-zahlungsservices Wir bieten innovative E-Commerce Lösungen für mehr als 160
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ingenico ePayments*: Höhere umsätze durch online-zahlungsservices Wir bieten innovative E-Commerce Lösungen für mehr als 160.000 Kunden in Europa und Weltweit an *Ehemals als Ogone bekannt
module.additional_description: Mit Ingenico ePayments als Ihrem Processing-Partner profitiert Ihr Unternehmen gleich mehrfach: Die schnelle und sichere Verarbeitung von Internet-Zahlungen durch unsere skalierbaren Lösungen versetzt Sie als Betreiber eines Online- oder Mobil-Webshops in die Lage, Ihre Umsätze spürbar zu steigern, einen größeren Kundenkreis zu erreichen und Ihr Geschäft vor Betrügern zu schützen.

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your store from fraudulent payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your store from fraudulent payments

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines.
module.additional_description: Sell your products List on Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, 11 Main, Rakuten, eBay Commerce Network, shopping.com, Shopzilla, PriceGrabber, and more than 1000 other sales channels internationally. Enhance Your Data Our DataFix Toolbox easily patches holes in your product data that would otherwise prevent you from listing and selling your products on a sales channel. Never Pay for Setup Shopping Feed's Automated setup gets you up and running on your favorite sales channels in a flash. Our dedicated support team will make sure you get connected, no matter how complicated the setup.

module.name: iziflux
module.description: Service not yet available in english, coming soon

module.description_full: Service not yet available in english, coming soon
module.additional_description: Service not yet available in english, coming soon

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gamification
module.description: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!﻿
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!﻿

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Zeigen Sie Ihre zu den Menschen in dem Augenblick, sie suchen, was Sie anbieten
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Zeigen Sie Ihre zu den Menschen in dem Augenblick, sie suchen, was Sie anbieten. Google und PrestaShop Ihre Werbeinvestitionen € 75 durch das Angebot erhöhen, nachdem der erste € 25 ausgegeben!  Laden Sie das Modul Ihren Gutscheincode zu erhalten und starten Sie Ihre Kampagne jetzt!
module.additional_description: Mit Google AdWords können Sie immer dann gefunden werden, wenn potenzielle Kunden bei Google nach Ihren Produkten oder Dienstleistungen suchen. Probieren Sie es am besten noch heute aus. Kostenlose Starthilfe: 0800 6270 942

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : DAS All-in-One Plug-in für Ihre E-Mails & SMS (Marketing und SMTP)
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendinBlue : DAS All-in-One Plug-in für Ihre E-Mails & SMS (Marketing und SMTP). Synchronisieren Sie Ihre Prestashop-Kontakte zu SendinBlue, erstellen Sie einfach schöne E-Mail Kampagnen und kommunizieren mit Ihren Kunden und potenziellen Kunden.
module.additional_description: SendinBlue ermöglicht :Eine automatische Synchronisierung Ihrer Kontakte zu SendinBlue, die Verfolgung Ihrer TransaktionenDen Versand von schönen Newsletters.Eine optimierte Zustellbarkeit Ihrer Transaktions email im Posteingang (Anmeldung und Auftragsbestätigung usw.)Eine Verfolgung Ihrer Kampagnenberichte in EchtzeitEinen dedizierten Kundenservice per Telefon und E-MailSehen Sie sich unser Tutorial an : https://resources.sendinblue.com/de/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: payplug
module.description: With PayPlug, online payment has never been so easy. Our online payment solution can be used with or without a merchant account and can be installed with just a few clicks
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With PayPlug, online payment has never been so easy. Our online payment solution can be used with or without a merchant account and can be installed with just a few clicks.
module.additional_description: Our modern and intuitive solution allows you to improve your conversion rate with our functions and ergonomics specifically designed for e-commerce. Thanks to PayPlug, you can simplify your online payments and no longer lose out on sales:Quick payment without registrationModern and sleek designAutomatic detection of card type

module.description_full: Adds a block with a graphical representation of the development of your store(s) based on selected key data.

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.name: gridhtml
module.description: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules.

module.name: pagesnotfound
module.description: Displays the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found. This module adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found. This module adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found.
module.additional_description: This page tells you which pages of your catalog people have attempted to access but could not find (resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors). This is useful for finding potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.name: sekeywords
module.description: Displays which keywords have led visitors to your website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays which keywords have led visitors to your website.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Manage all your automated web tasks from a single interface
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Manage all your automated web tasks from a single interface.

module.name: prestashippingeasy
module.description: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections. Quickly fulfill orders placed on your website and marketplaces, including eBay, Amazon, Sears, Newegg and more. An easy to use system backed by exceptional service from shipping specialists. And, the best USPS rates - up to 46% off. FREE starter plan for up to 50 packages a month.
module.additional_description: Prestashop + ShippingEasy = the right combination for easy, fast, shipping with built-in savings  Sync all your orders in one locationSave up to 46% with the best USPS ratesEasy carrier integration with USPS, UPS and FedExFREE starter plan for up to 50 shipments per monthExceptional customer support Prestashop syncs automatically with ShippingEasy, downloading in all your order details in minutes and helping you assign shipping preferences, rates and delivery options in real-time. No cut and paste. No manual update. Save up to 46% Finally, access to competitive USPS rates – in fact, the cheapest around. For example: USPS Priority Mail: Medium Flat Rate box: retail $12.35, our price: $10.65 – a savings of $1.70 on a single shipment. Built in savings! All part of the service.

module.name: paygreen
module.description: PayGreen allows you to simply accept credit card payments on your online store PrestaShop (with or without bank contract )
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayGreen allows you to simply accept credit card payments on your online store PrestaShop (with or without bank contract )
module.additional_description: This payment module allows you to customize your payment page:Your payment page with your colorsOccasionally organize fundraising operations for organizations of your choiceEnable / Disable 3D secure systemSubmit a recurring payment to your customers Our pricing is based on your monthly sales volume : PayGreen is one of the most economical solutions on the market. Our pricing fits your monthly turnover.

module.name: ewayrapid
module.description: eWAY is a leading all-in-one secure payments platform, allowing businesses to accept secure credit card payments from customers around the world
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: eWAY is a leading all-in-one secure payments platform, allowing businesses to accept secure credit card payments from customers around the world.
module.additional_description: Securely accept card payments from your PrestaShop store - customers enter their card details in your store and the data is sent directly to eWAY for processing.Increase checkout completion by offering multiple payment options: credit card, PayPal and MasterPass by MasterCard.Works with eWAY's anti-fraud technologies to help smash fraud.Test your store out with the eWAY Sandbox

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: Mit dem Klarna Checkout können Sie die gesamte Zahlungsabwicklung von Klarna übernehmen lassen oder Sie verbessern Ihren bestehenden Checkout, indem Sie Ihr Angebot um Rechnung und Ratenkauf
module.author: Prestaworks
module.description_full: Mit dem Klarna Checkout können Sie die gesamte Zahlungsabwicklung von Klarna übernehmen lassen oder Sie verbessern Ihren bestehenden Checkout, indem Sie Ihr Angebot um Rechnung und Ratenkauf erweitern.  Lassen Sie Ihre Kunden nach Lieferung bezahlen und genießen Sie dabei 100% Zahlungsgarantie.
module.additional_description: Einfache Nutzung - smoooth:  Mit Klarna zu starten ist ganz einfach. Lassen Sie Klarna Ihre Rechnungsabwicklung übernehmen und minimieren Sie administrative Aufgaben.   Ohne Risiko. Sie erhalten immer Ihr Geld: Klarna übernimmt das Kredit- und Betrugsrisiko der Händler während des gesamten Kundenerlebnis.   Kein Risiko – Sie erhalten immer Ihr Geld: Klarna übernimmt das gesamte Kredit- und Betrugsrisiko für den Online-Händler. Als Shopbetreiber erhalten Sie also immer Ihr Geld.   Optimiert für alle Endgeräte: Klarnas frägt nur nach Daten, die Endkunden ohnehin im Kopf haben. Das steigert die Conversionrate. Mobile Endgeräte erzielen dabei gleich hohe Raten, wie Desktops.   Optimiert für alle Endgeräte: Klarnas frägt nur nach Daten, die Endkunden ohnehin im Kopf haben. Das steigert die Conversionrate. Mobile Endgeräte erzielen dabei gleich hohe Raten, wie Desktops.   Das wichtigste an Klarna: Ihre Conversionrate wird steigen und Ihren Kunden haben die Möglichkeit - risikofrei - den beliebten Kauf auf Rechnung zu wählen und somit erst nach Lieferung bezahlen.

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: Mit Amazon Pay können sich Millionen von Amazon-Kunden ganz einfach auf Drittanbieter-Websites mithilfe der in Ihrem Amazon-Konto hinterlegten Zahlungs- und Versandinformationen anmelden und beza
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Mit Amazon Pay können sich Millionen von Amazon-Kunden ganz einfach auf Drittanbieter-Websites mithilfe der in Ihrem Amazon-Konto hinterlegten Zahlungs- und Versandinformationen anmelden und bezahlen. Amazon Pay kann Händlern dabei helfen, neue Kunden gewinnen, den Umsatz zu steigern und potenzielle Kunden zum Kauf zu bewegen. Es ist schnell, einfach und sicher.
module.additional_description: Mit Amazon Pay können Sie:Die Kundentreue stärkenNeue Kunden gewinnenDie Konversionsrate steigernBetrug reduzierenDen Bestellprozess auf mobilen Geräten optimieren Registrieren Sie sich jetzt für Amazon Pay!

module.name: cartsguru
module.displayName: Carts Guru | Abandoned Cart Solution | Free Trial
module.description: PrestaShop has chosen Carts Guru as a native retargeting solution for cart abandonment
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PrestaShop has chosen Carts Guru as a native retargeting solution for cart abandonment. Carts Guru combines multichannel strategies to easily convert more than 20% of your abandoned carts through retargeting emails, SMS, automatic calls and Facebook.
module.additional_description: Carts Guru will help you to convert your "almost buyers" into paying customers. Multichannel Retargeting: Emails, Facebook Ads, Instagram, SMS, and Automatic CallsConvert more than 20% of your abandoned cartsAutomatic suggestions to continuously improve your rules Carts Guru is your all-in-one retargeting solution. Try it for free for 14 days, no credit card needed. You only pay a commission when Carts Guru converts your carts. Check our website: https://carts.guru/en/prestashop

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Adds an information block aimed at offering helpful information to reassure customers that your store is trustworthy
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds an information block aimed at offering helpful information to reassure customers that your store is trustworthy.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Displays a banner on your shop. ​With the default theme Classic, it appears at the bottom of the homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a banner on your shop. ​With the default theme Classic, it appears at the bottom of the homepage.
module.additional_description: ​Use this space to promote your seasonal offers or some important section of your shop!

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Shows the current category and subcategories in a block on the left column of your shop. ​It is useful to navigate the category pages and visualize the subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows the current category and subcategories in a block on the left column of your shop. ​It is useful to navigate the category pages and visualize the subcategories.
module.additional_description: ​Makes it easier for your customer to navigate your shop and see available subcategories.

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Add contact information in the header and footer of your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add contact information in the header and footer of your store.In the header: either the "Call us" information or a "Contact us" link (redirecting to the contact page)In the footer: your shop's name, address and contact information
module.additional_description: Contact information is essential for a shop as it is part of what reassure the customers. Visitors will know they can join you through the medium of their choice, so do not hesitate to provide your contact details if you want your customers to reach you!

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Adds a block that displays information about the customer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block that displays information about the customer.

module.name: ps_customtext
module.description: Display custom blocks of rich text in one zone, usually on the homepage. Thanks to hooks, you can display this block anywhere in your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display custom blocks of rich text in one zone, usually on the homepage. Thanks to hooks, you can display this block anywhere in your shop. For instance, you can use this block of text to make a short presentation of your brand on your homepage.
module.additional_description: ​By providing information to your customers, this block of text can help you both in your content strategy and your search engine optimization.

module.name: ps_emailsubscription
module.description: Adds a form for newsletter subscription
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a form for newsletter subscription.

module.name: ps_featuredproducts
module.description: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage. With this module, you can choose which products to highlight by placing them on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage. With this module, you can choose which products to highlight by placing them on your homepage.

module.name: ps_imageslider
module.description: This module adds a slider block on your homepage's central column, where you can define a set of images that will be displayed one after the other, with a sliding motion
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module adds a slider block on your homepage's central column, where you can define a set of images that will be displayed one after the other, with a sliding motion.
module.additional_description: Increase the visibility of chosen products or offersEnhance customer experience by displaying a lively homepage with a professional look

module.name: ps_shoppingcart
module.description: The cart summary is an essential step before closing a sale. This module adds a block with the customer's cart content
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The cart summary is an essential step before closing a sale. This module adds a block with the customer's cart content. It displays the number of products in the cart, with a summary, and acts as an entry point to the checkout.
module.additional_description: ​Remind your customer what they are about to purchase.

module.name: ps_wirepayment
module.description: Accept payments by bank transfer. Your customers will be able to pay their orders by wire payment
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept payments by bank transfer. Your customers will be able to pay their orders by wire payment. At the last step of the checkout, it will indicate to which account the payment should be transferred. This information will also be sent together with the confirmation email. The order will not be validated right away. You will have to change its status to "Payment received" when you actually received the payment.
module.additional_description: Adds an additional payment method to provide more flexibility to your customers.

module.name: ps_linklist
module.description: Display links to your static pages (CMS and more) in left or right blocks in your shop's columns. You can configure this module with the "Link Widget" page from the Design section
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display links to your static pages (CMS and more) in left or right blocks in your shop's columns. You can configure this module with the "Link Widget" page from the Design section.
module.additional_description: ​Give more visibility to your pages, where you want and when you want.

module.name: sendcloud
module.displayName: SendCloud | Das Nummer 1 Versandtool für Webshops
module.description: SendCloud hilft Onlinehändlern ihren Versandprozess zu optimieren und erfolgreich zu wachsen
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendCloud hilft Onlinehändlern ihren Versandprozess zu optimieren und erfolgreich zu wachsen. Paketversand war noch nie so einfach!
module.additional_description: SendCloud ist das clevere Versandtool für E-Commerce Unternehmen. Mit nur einem Klick können Sie Versandetiketten erstellen und mit mehreren Paketdiensten wie DPD, DHL und UPS versenden - mit oder ohne eigenen Vertrag. Zeitsparendes VersandtoolMit SendCloud können Sie Ihren gesamten Versandprozess optimieren. Von Bestellungen importieren, Versandlabels drucken, personalisierte Tracking-Emails bis hin zu Retouren abwickeln, können Sie ab sofort jeden Schritt des Versandprozess automatisieren. Mehrere Versandoptionen anbieten und Umsatz steigernUntersuchungen haben gezeigt, dass 67% der Besucher den Webshop während des Check-Out Prozesses abbrechen. Daher wird es immer wichtiger, Kunden mehrere Versandoptionen anzubieten. Versandkosten sparen

module.name: ps_feeder
module.description: This module generates a RSS feed for your latest products. A RSS feed is a website content syndication format, which enables anyone to display the latest content from a website on another
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module generates a RSS feed for your latest products. A RSS feed is a website content syndication format, which enables anyone to display the latest content from a website on another. In case of a multistore installation, you can display the new products from one shop, right in the sidebar of another of your shop using its RSS Feed Block module. If you would rather not have your content be available to anyone online, disable this module.
module.additional_description: Increase your sales: with this module, loyal customers will be able to get regular updates about products added to your catalog, by adding this feed to their own feed reader, without the need to subscribe to your newsletterImprove your SEO: search engines may use it to discover your new contentIncrease traffic: other websites will be able to display your new products on their page

module.name: ps_reminder
module.description: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails. This module enables you to create e-mail alerts for your customers
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails. This module enables you to create e-mail alerts for your customers. It gives you a way to automatically send discount vouchers to some of your customers.
module.additional_description: Recapture lost sales with reminders on canceled cartsIncrease customer loyalty by sending vouchers to a customer that reaches a given amount of ordersIncentivize re-purchase by sending vouchers to who customer who only ordered once and did not come back to your siteReward first-time customers by sending them a voucher after their first validated order

module.name: xsellco
module.description: xSellco is the leading e-commerce help desk, tailored specifically for online retailers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: xSellco is the leading e-commerce help desk, tailored specifically for online retailers. Centralize customer queries and order details from your Prestashop and other sales channels like Amazon, eBay and more in one simple dashboard.
module.additional_description: Save time and costs on customer supportProvide faster responses Expand globally with in-built auto-translate Free live chat/contact formUnlimited usersUnlimited channelsCollaborative team dashboardNo overlapping query responsesMeasure team performanceTrack key metrics like response times and message volume for different query types like Returns.

module.name: digitaleo
module.description: Directly incorporated into the Prestashop back office, you can easily synchronise your contacts and create all your emails, newsletters, and SMS to communicate more efficiently with your clients
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Directly incorporated into the Prestashop back office, you can easily synchronise your contacts and create all your emails, newsletters, and SMS to communicate more efficiently with your clients. Test it and enjoy 10 000 emails and 100 free SMS!
module.additional_description: Thanks to Digitaleo: -          Save time thanks to the contact synchronization between Prestashop and Digitaleo-          Segment your contacts and easily create lists to communicate in a more focused and relevant way-          Send high quality and responsive emails thanks to the huge variety of templates one can customize-          Increase your customer loyalty by sending them personalized messages-          Generate more traffic to your website by informing your current and potential clients about promotions or new products-          Simplify  your tasks by programming the date and time you want to send in your emails-          Optimise your marketing campaigns by accessing your detailed statistics-          Ensuring an optimised deliver ratio in your emails and SMS-          Enjoy a technical support expert in your activity sector

module.name: stripe_official

Rückzahlungskosten)

module.name: genei
module.description: With our module, you can export prestashop oders to Genei ships in seconds!. Gives your Prestashop a new feature of saving shiping costs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With our module, you can export prestashop oders to Genei ships in seconds!. Gives your Prestashop a new feature of saving shiping costs. Try now, is free! We make more than 3000 ships per day!
module.additional_description: Merchants will save a lot of money using a online price-compare solution with many years of experience, and they can adjust price of products with more benefit margin.

module.name: feedbiz
module.description: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.additional_description: You configure once and then magic occurs ; everything becomes automatic ! This means that you no longer need to connect to multiple back-offices, you manage everything from Prestashop. Cdiscount Flux is a cloud-based, self-contained solution that enables you to automate the management of catalog, orders, order tracking. You no longer have to worry about inventory updates, new product creations, Cdiscount Flux automatically manages feeds to and from Cdiscount marketplace. Cdiscount Flux automatically imports your orders into Prestashop, updates quantities, prices, manages repricing, invoice sendings and many other features. Cdiscount Flux is not a feed integrator or aggregator but a cloud solution that allows you to manage your own feeds. You boost your sales thanks to the traffic and sales generated by Cdiscount and Cdiscount Flux automatically manages the entire sales process and listing. You benefit from all features offered by Cdiscount, free 4 times payment handled by Cdiscount, multiple delivery methods (home delivery and collection point), repricing (price adjustment) and more.The support is reactive and free, 5 agents are permanently at your disposal to answer your questions.

module.name: adroll
module.description: Durch die Integration von PrestaShop in AdRoll locken Sie neue und ehemalige Besucher auf Ihre Website, erhöhen Ihre Conversion-Zahlen und steigern den Umsatz mit Bestandskunden
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Durch die Integration von PrestaShop in AdRoll locken Sie neue und ehemalige Besucher auf Ihre Website, erhöhen Ihre Conversion-Zahlen und steigern den Umsatz mit Bestandskunden.
module.additional_description: Die meisten Besucher verlassen eine E-Commerce-Website, ohne einen Kauf getätigt zu haben. AdRoll Retargeting erleichtert Ihnen die Kontaktaufnahme zu diesen verloren geglaubten Besuchern in Form von personalisierten Anzeigen mit Produkt-Empfehlungen auf Geräten aller Art – im Web, per E-Mail sowie über Facebook und Instagram. Im Durchschnitt verzeichnen unsere PrestaShop-Kunden durch die Nutzung von AdRoll eine siebenfache Steigerung des ROI. Ausgaben in Höhe von 10 $ steht somit ein Umsatz von 70 $ gegenüber, der AdRoll direkt zuzuschreiben ist. Dieses PrestaShop-Modul bietet ein verbessertes Onboarding-Erlebnis bei der Integration in AdRoll. Es platziert das AdRoll-Pixel, erstellt Zielgruppensegmente, richtet das Umsatz-/ROI-Tracking ein und synchronisiert zudem Ihren Katalog mit dynamischen Anzeigen und Produktempfehlungen. Weitere Vorteile:● Nutzen Sie AdRoll, um Besucher im Web, auf Mobilgeräten und über Facebook erneut anzusprechen.● Steigern Sie Ihre Absatzzahlen und vermeiden Sie Warenkorbabbrüche – genau wie unsere 25.000+ Kunden.● Keine Mindestbeträge. Kundenbetreuung über E-Mail, Chat und Telefon. Wir schenken Ihnen sogar kostenlose Anzeigen!

module.name: cloudswipe
module.description: The Best Hosted Payment Page - looks EXACTLY like the rest of your site! Connects to 170+ payment gateways including AuthorizeNet, PayPal, and Stripe. No other payment modules needed
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Best Hosted Payment Page - looks EXACTLY like the rest of your site! Connects to 170+ payment gateways including AuthorizeNet, PayPal, and Stripe. No other payment modules needed.
module.additional_description: Security: The most secure way to collect payments onlineSimplicity: The easiest way to make your site PCI compliant.Savings: No need to buy other payment gateway add-ons. 150+ gateways included for free. No SSL required. CloudSwipe skins your hosted payment page with your PrestaShop theme so it looks exactly like the rest of your website. The most customizable, easiest to use, hosted payment page ever. You get:All the security for PCI compliant paymentsA secure payment page that looks exactly like the rest of your websiteSupport for over 150 payment gatewaysHappy customers confident in your securityPeace of mind You do NOT need:To buy a payment gateway module (150+ gateways are already integrated)Your own SSL certificate (payments are secured with SSL)To worry about security (we handle it for you)

module.name: cleverreach
module.description: Carglass, TESA, bugatti, DHL und REWE erstellen & versenden ihre Newsletter mit CleverReach®. Warum? Weil es einfach einfach ist
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Carglass, TESA, bugatti, DHL und REWE erstellen & versenden ihre Newsletter mit CleverReach®. Warum? Weil es einfach einfach ist. Profitieren Sie mit Ihrem PrestaShop von unserer Software & flexiblen Preisen ohne Vertragslaufzeit.
module.additional_description: Das Modul verbindet unser CleverReach® E-Mail-Marketing Tool direkt mit Ihrem PrestaShop. Sofort werden laufend ganz automatisch alle wichtigen „PrestaShop-Daten“ im CleverReach® Newslettertool aktualisiert und ergänzt. Durch die Synchronisation sparen Sie wertvolle Zeit und Nerven. Gleichzeitig vermeiden Sie Fehler, die bei manuellen Im- und Exports häufig auftreten. Diese PrestaShop-Daten werden synchronisiert: Newsletter-Anmeldungen und -AbmeldungenVorname, Nachname, Interesse, Geschlecht, Alter, Geburtstag, Adressdaten...gekaufte Produkte, Umsätze, Häufigkeit der Käufe, durchschnittlicher Warenkorb, Bestellnummer, Artikelnummer, Produktname, Preis, Währung, Menge…Produktinformationen Ihrer PrestaShop-Artikel wie Bild, Text, Preis, Größen, Material…Weil einfach einfach einfach ist Nutzen Sie diese hilfreichen Daten für persönliche Angebote, die Ihre Kunden wirklich interessieren. Sie profitieren von mehr Öffnungen, mehr Klicks und mehr Conversions!Dies ist Ihr Schlüssel zu einfach mehr Umsatz: Ihre Kunden kaufen mehr und häufiger – einfach Gewinn. Gewinn. Gewinn. Jetzt oben rechts auf „Herunterladen/Download“ klicken, das Modul downloaden und ohne viel Aufwand im PrestaShop-Backend installieren. Danach können Sie Ihren PrestaShop schnell und einfach mit CleverReach® verbinden, Ihre Shopdaten synchronisieren und die erste E-Mail erstellen und versenden. Mit mehr als 165.000 Kunden, z.B. Spotify, Carglass, TESA, DHL und REWE, ist CleverReach® in 152 Ländern Lösungsanbieter für E-Mail-Marketing. CleverReach® wurde 2007 in Deutschland gegründet und erfüllt höchste Datenschutz-Standards. Exklusiv für PrestaShop-Kunden: 12 Monate 10% Neukunden-Preisvorteil auf Ihren CleverReach®-Tarif sichern!Einfach einfach: wird bei Neu-Account-Erstellung automatisch für Sie hinterlegt.

module.name: upela
module.description: Liefern Sie die Bestellungen von Ihren Kunden mit dringenden, Express- oder Economy-LieferungenVersenden Sie ins Inland, Europa und weltweit! (Mehr als 220 Bestimmungsorte verfügbar)
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Liefern Sie die Bestellungen von Ihren Kunden mit dringenden, Express- oder Economy-LieferungenVersenden Sie ins Inland, Europa und weltweit! (Mehr als 220 Bestimmungsorte verfügbar)
module.additional_description: Upela erleichtert die Versandlogistik der E-Sellers und KMU und bietet nur die besten Angebote mit höher Servicequalität und immer am besten Preis.Das UPELA Versandmodul gibt Ihnen den Zugriff zu: - Tür-zu-Tür-Lieferungen sowie Paketaufgaben- professionellen Automatisierungstools, die Ihre täglichen Arbeiten einfacher machen. Ohne Verbindung, sparen Sie Geld mit Upela, ohne auf Qualität verzichten zu müssen. Mit Upela bleiben Ihre Kunden über den Versandstatus informiertProfitieren Sie von den besten Angeboten von zuverlässigen Frachtführern und benutzen Sie unseren integrierten Tool, um Ihre Versandverwaltung zu erleichtern.Mehr Qualität beim Transport, um die Kundenbindung zu fördern.

module.name: mailchimpintegration
module.description: Connect your store, sell more stuff. More than 15 million people use MailChimp to create targeted email & ad campaigns to help grow their business
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Connect your store, sell more stuff. More than 15 million people use MailChimp to create targeted email & ad campaigns to help grow their business. When you add the official MailChimp module to your store, you increase the power of both.
module.additional_description: See detailed campaign reports—from engagement to ROI—so you can sell more stuff.Sync and segment your list, then send targeted campaigns based on things like products purchased and amount spent over time.Create abandoned cart emails, send product recommendations, and more.Follow up with, delight, and re-engage your customers using pre-built customer lifecycle automations.Design and send personalized transactional messages—like shipping notifications, invoices, and more—directly through MailChimp.

module.description: Rapid check the design of your website on real devicesTesting Digital takes screenshots of each of your pages on each of the configurations you have set (browsers, OS, devices model/maker) with a sing
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Rapid check the design of your website on real devicesTesting Digital takes screenshots of each of your pages on each of the configurations you have set (browsers, OS, devices model/maker) with a single click.
module.additional_description: Get screenshots of your pages.Test on real devices.Boost your ROI. Facilitates conversion.Secure your business with a quality website.Optimizes the purchase tunnel and improve security.With a bug free website, no excuse for the customer to finalize the command.

module.name: ns8csp
module.description: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Reduce your store’s chargebacks, increase the effectiveness of your ad campaigns, and ensure quality of your site’s user experience.
module.additional_description: NS8 Complete Storefront Protection uses industry-leading techniques to identify bots and other malicious activity. As a platform-based approach to online threat reduction, NS8 Complete Storefront Protection is designed to help your eCommerce businesses fight the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Revenue Killer #1: Order Fraud NS8 Complete Storefront Protection watches and scores every visitor to your store. When we detect suspicious activity before, during, or after an order is placed, it is reflected in the order’s EQ8 score. An order with a low score is most likely fraudulent, and depending on how low the score is, it is held or flagged for manual review. When an order’s score is low enough to be suspicious, but not low enough for the store administrator to confidently cancel the order, NS8 Compete Storefront Protection provides the tools to escalate the order and request e-mail and SMS text verification from the user. If the user verifies their phone number, the store administrator can process the order with confidence. Revenue Killer #2: Advertising Fraud Advertising fraud (especially remarketing fraud) is a huge and growing issue for online merchants. Up to 34% of online advertising campaign budgets are stolen using fraudulent traffic. NS8 Complete Storefront Protection not only scores all of the traffic visiting your store, but it also detects and records the traffic’s source. You will see when, and which, advertising campaigns are delivering low-quality, high-risk, fraudulent traffic. You will be able to save money and increase revenue by eliminating poorly performing campaigns and focusing your budget on the successful campaigns that deliver results. Revenue Killer #3: Poor Performance NS8 Complete Storefront Protection includes five critical monitors that every PrestaShop store should have to ensure their store’s performance and customer experience. These include the monitoring of SSL certificates, being added to a spam list, getting flagged for malware, store pages failing to load correctly, and any drop in performance against the global average of online stores. When an issue arises, you'll be automatically notified immediately via email and/or SMS.

module.name: nexixpay
module.description: From the experience of CartaSi and ICBPI, Nexi is born to build together the future of digital payments in Italy. Nexi XPay is a payment gateway that allows you to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: From the experience of CartaSi and ICBPI, Nexi is born to build together the future of digital payments in Italy. Nexi XPay is a payment gateway that allows you to accept online payments.
module.additional_description: With XPay you have:a complete offer of integrated payment methods: - transaction management for Visa, Mastercard, Visa Electron, V-Pay, Maestro, American Express, Diners international schemes - acceptance of every type of Wallet: MySi, Masterpass e PayPala multichannel platform, granted by a checkout page that is optimized for mobile, tablet e desktop and by compatibility with merchant's app through SDK packages for Android and IOSa simple and intuitive payment interface, designed to improve customer's purchase experience, offering several possibilities of online payment (Easy checkOut, Recurrent Payments, OneClickPay)functionality to accept payments from all over the world. - customers can pay in euros or other currencies, with a guaranteed exchange rate, thanks to Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) service.protection and security of all payment transactions. Use of cryptographic protocols SLL-TSL, 3D procedure and CVV2 security codes. XPay is also compliant to PCI-DSS standardMaximum flexibility and customization -merchant e-commerce logo on payment page -payment page integrated on the e-commerce website without having to handle the sensitive customer data thanks to a customizable interface (iframe o lightbox) -100% Customizable Checkout thanks to Hosted Fields -Possibility to change interface's language when paying with Nexiavailability of integration with merchant's working environment -Configuration of the cash mode: immediate, deferred, total or partial -Integration through API with merchant's website to handle the orders directly - advanced reporting (transaction profiling of customers, management of receipts, cancellations and Refunds, contracts Management for recurring payments) -business continuity: XPay guarantees constant operativeness, with no service interruptionschoosing the current account to which transfer payments for online transactions commercial assistance and specialized technical support   For more informations https://ecommerce.nexi.it

module.name: pspixel
module.description: Set up the official Facebook Pixel module to reach new potential customers and easily analyze the activity and performance of your shop!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Set up the official Facebook Pixel module to reach new potential customers and easily analyze the activity and performance of your shop!
module.additional_description: Use the Facebook pixel with your Prestashop website to:   -          Measure the results of your ads: Understand sales that resulted from your Facebook campaigns using Facebook ads reporting. -          Reach the right people: Find new customers and optimize your ads for people who are more likely to make a purchase by creating custom audiences. -          Show the right products: Automatically create ads that showcase your products, or use dynamic ads to retarget your site visitors with relevant ads based on what they browsed on your website

module.name: dhlexpress
module.description: Integrate the official DHL Express® module for express delivery in France and internationnaly
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate the official DHL Express® module for express delivery in France and internationnaly.According to destination, provide 4 delivery modes : before 9am, before noon, end of day delivery & economic offer within 48/96hours.
module.additional_description: Enhance your international growth and in France in one click : no need of further development. All the services of the best logistician for international Express delivery door-to-door are included. Choose DHL Quality service: ·        preview your personnal quotation,·        manage your shipments,·        request for pickups,·        manage return labels, ·        track your shipping… Within few clicks, configure your module & take advantage of DHL innovative services for your online consumer everywhere in the world.

module.name: mtarget
module.description: Use the power of the SMS to reassure your clients and increase your sales!Sales status, shopping basket reminder, birthdays or Marketing Cible campaigns, give your shop an extra breath with our SMS mo
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Use the power of the SMS to reassure your clients and increase your sales!Sales status, shopping basket reminder, birthdays or Marketing Cible campaigns, give your shop an extra breath with our SMS module.
module.additional_description: Strengthen your client relations and increase your sales thanks to our handy and simple SMS sending solution. Inform your clients in real time of the progression of their purchaseRemind them of their current shopping basketCommunicate efficiently on all your events (sales, private sales, …)Segment and synchronize automatically your contacts on our platformBe informed by SMS about any new subscriptions, new orders and purchases or return demandsFollow and analyse the results of your campaignsManage your budget (no subscription, no hidden costs)After sale services and support based in FranceLowest price on  the market

module.name: gestpay
module.description: The official Gestpay’s (www.gestpay.it) plugin for PrestaShop enables you to accept any form of payment supported by Banca Sella Group’s payment gateway
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The official Gestpay’s (www.gestpay.it) plugin for PrestaShop enables you to accept any form of payment supported by Banca Sella Group’s payment gateway.
module.additional_description: GestPay is the solution that allows to maximize your e-commerce conversions, thanks to the customization of the platform by integrating functions that also optimize the customer user experience. It is possible to accept payments by credit and debit card and over 200 alternative payment methods, with the security of an evolved fraud prevention system built upon artificial intelligence technologies.

module.name: recolize
module.description: Personalisierung ist ein Must-Have für jeden PrestaShop. Umsatz maximieren, Aufwand minimieren. Kinderleicht mit Recolize! Kostenlos, keine Kreditkarte
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Personalisierung ist ein Must-Have für jeden PrestaShop. Umsatz maximieren, Aufwand minimieren. Kinderleicht mit Recolize! Kostenlos, keine Kreditkarte.
module.additional_description: Wussten Sie, dass die meisten Besucher Ihren Shop wieder verlassen, ohne irgendetwas zu tun?Optimieren Sie Ihren Traffic mit vollautomatischen, personalisierten Produktempfehlungen und begeistern Sie Ihre Kunden mit den richtigen Produkten zur richtigen Zeit. Ihre Kunden werden es Ihnen danken mit bis zu 4-fach höheren Conversion Rateszusätzlichem Umsatz bis zu 20 %einem höheren durchschnittlichen Warenkorbwert Starten Sie jetzt kostenlos mit der Recolize Plug & Play-Lösung. Erfolgsbasiertes Preismodell: wir schenken Ihnen 1.000 Klicks auf unsere Produktempfehlungen jeden Monat, danach kostet Sie jeder Klick nur 0,039 €.

module.name: hermesc
module.description: Mit dem Modul Hermes Shipping Interface Connector erstellen Sie Ihre Versandetiketten für Hermes direkt aus dem Backoffice Ihres Prestashops
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: Mit dem Modul Hermes Shipping Interface Connector erstellen Sie Ihre Versandetiketten für Hermes direkt aus dem Backoffice Ihres Prestashops. Paketgröße wählen, Label generieren, ausdrucken - fertig.
module.additional_description: Sie können beliebig viele Labels pro Bestellung generieren und ausdrucken und Ihren Kunden sogar die Möglichkeit bieten, Ihre Bestellung an Paketshops liefern zu lassen. Die Abwicklung des Versandprozesses mit Hermes kann ganz leicht direkt aus dem PrestaShop-Backoffice erfolgenZusätzliche Hermes-Services können innerhalb des Backoffices ausgewählt werdenAuf die Hermes Sendungsverfolgung kann aus dem Prestashop-Backoffice zugegriffen werdenBereitstellung der Paketshop-Suche und weiterer Services bietet Ihren Kunden eine positive EinkaufserfahrungAbholaufträge werden ebenfalls im PrestaShop-Backoffice eingestellt

module.name: match2one
module.description: Match2One will help you find new customers online, by placing ads across 1000's of relevant websites in front of people who are likely to become your next customer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Match2One will help you find new customers online, by placing ads across 1000's of relevant websites in front of people who are likely to become your next customer.  No minimum investments, no signups fees and is easy to use.
module.additional_description: By connecting Match2One to your website, the platform will automatically learn about your online audience - where to find new customers online, and target people who have visited your site. You can sit back and relax, Match2One’s optimisation engine will automatically make intelligent choices for you. If you’re looking for an advertising tool that will help you get more new customers, you’ve come to the right place. Find new customers → A Prospecting campaign tracks, analyses data from your webshop and uses this to find similar customers online. This will help you drive more traffic and increase your sales.Convert more visitors → Retargeting converts visitors into buyers. Generally 2-3% of shoppers convert on the first visit to an online store. Retargeting brings back the other 97%. Retargeting works by tracking people who visit your site and showing your ads to them as they visit other sites online.
